basic_data.name: Primus Waterjet INTERMAC
basic_data.additional_name: Material for processing: Steel, Stainless steel, Aluminum, Cast iron, Non-ferrous metals, Plastic, Marble, Glass
basic_data.description: This machine is used in the stone processing industry for producing pattern elements, company logos, furniture, and decorations from stone, ceramics, and other materials such as wood, steel, and glass. It is a cost-effective tool for both single and mass production.

main_characteristics.title: Multifunctional Processing Center with 4000x1860 mm Table
content: The Primus 322 offers a worktable with dimensions of 4000x1860 mm, allowing material processing up to 250 mm thick (3 axes) or 200 mm (5 axes). The stainless steel construction ensures stability and durability, while efficient abrasive usage allows for high productivity with reduced operating costs. Additionally, the machine is equipped with a 200-liter tank for abrasives and water, featuring an automatic dosing and cleaning system to ensure smooth operation and prevent blockages.

main_characteristics.title: Primus with Windows Operating System
content: The Primus stands out with its advanced control system, which includes a PC with a Windows operating system. This allows not only machine operation but also project preparation in a CAD/CAM application. Additionally, the machine comes standard with a modem and a teleservice function, enabling remote access for updates and diagnostics. Safety during operation is ensured by photocells that shut down the machine if the barrier around the work area is crossed.

specification.name: Machine type
param: 3- or 5-axis processing center for water-abrasive cutting

specification.name: Construction material
param: Load-bearing structure and housing made of stainless steel
